game.name: Country Girl Keiko
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Play as Keiko, a socially awkward woman living in a small country village. Explore the town and help her overcome her social anxiety, so she can thrive at her university.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Play as Keiko, a socially awkward woman living in a small country village. Explore the town and help her overcome her social anxiety, so she can thrive at her university.

reviewHighlights.text: I had to do some serious thinking about why I don't recommend this title. Assuming you have the 18+ patch, it's a fairly generic Kagura Games game, be...
